patterns.comment: Not sure if this even works in GSC

function.name: meta.function.gsc
function.comment: match regular function like: function myFunc(arg) {  }

class-decl.name: meta.class.gsc
class-decl.comment: match classes like: class Ham, class Cheddar : Cheese {  }

doc-data-types.name: entity.name.type.documentation.gsc
doc-data-types.comment: GSC/CSC data types to show in documentation

doc-data-modifiers.name: storage.modifier.documentation.gsc
doc-data-modifiers.comment: GSC/CSC modifiers to show in documentation
